FORRÓ IN SEATTLE

The first and only Forró community in Seattle. We promote classes, live shows, workshops with guest teachers from all over the world.

Come join us!

See Classes

CLASSES

Join us for our weekly Friday class! Check calendar for dates.

WHERE?

Union Cultural Center
803 S King St, Seattle

WHAT TIME?

8pm-9:00pm
Intro, beginner class, first timers welcomed!
9pm-10pm
Beginner plus class, basics needed but everybody is welcomed!
10pm-10h30
Social and practice time!

HOW MUCH?

$10 for one or all classes/social. Let's spread the love for forró!

FEBRUARY DATES

Classes in February are happening on the 1st, 15th

Class on February 22nd will be at 9pm before Encanto's concert at Studio Current.

CONCERTS

Join us at Studio Current for En Canto's live performance!

WORKSHOPS

DATE

April 7th 2019, Sunday

WHERE?

Studio Current
1100 E Pike St (Capitol Hill)
Entrance on 11th under Annex Theater

WHAT TIME?

Workshop: 4pm-6:00pm
Musicality, stops and repertoire.

Social: 6pm-9pm

HOW MUCH?

Workshop and social: $35
Workshop only: $30
Social only: $10

You can also check our Facebook event.
